message.title: Roads? Where we going we don’t need roads.
message.content: Hey, Doc. You’d better back up, we don’t have enough road to get up to 88.
message.author: Marty McFly

messages.title: Roads? Where we going we don’t need roads.
messages.content: Hey, Doc. You’d better back up, we don’t have enough road to get up to 88.
messages.author: Marty McFly

messages.title: Whoa, this is heavy.
messages.content: There’s that word again: "heavy." Why are things so heavy in the future? Is there a problem with the Earth’s gravitational pull?
messages.author: Doc Brown

messages.title: Great Scott!
messages.content: No, I know; you *did* send me back to the future. But I'm back - I'm back *from* the future.
messages.author: Marty McFly
